name: Sushi Scramble (Ranjann)
description:
You are a sentient piece of sushi stuck on a looping sushi carousel! Dodge the hands of hungry customers, rolling maki, squirming tentacles and the fearsome king crabs as you gather pieces of nigiri to use as a bridge to escape the restaurant!

Controls:

W: Up A: Left S: Down D: Right 

Space: Jump 

R: Restart Level

Collect 10 pieces of nigiri to complete each level.
